item.title: Two woman killed in Nagrkurnool, one in Gadwal due to lightning strikes
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two Woman Killed In Nagrkurnool One In Gadwal Due To Lightning Strikes
Two woman killed in Nagrkurnool, one in Gadwal due to lightning strikes
Suddenly heavy rains accompanied by thunderstorms lashed several parts of erstwhile Mahabubnagar
By Telangana Today Published Date - 3 April 2025, 07:01 PM
Mahabubnagar: Three persons, including two women and a man were killed and another woman sustained injuries after being struck by lightning in different incidents in Nagarkurnool and Jogulamda Gadw...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
